title: Xyron Create-a-Sticker, 5" Sticker and Label Maker Machine for Small Business and DIY Crafts, Includes Permanent Adhesive, Pre-Loaded (0501-05-10A), 9.055" x 5.709" x 5.906"
description: Create stickers in a snap. Using only a few turns of the knob, the Xyron Create-A-Sticker effortlessly applies edge-to-edge adhesive with very little mess and clean up. Place an item up to 5" wide into the machine, turn the knob, tear, and peel! It’s that easy. No heat, electricity, or messy glue required. Machine applies acid-free, non-toxic adhesive. Easy drop-in refills make replacement quick, great for adding adhesive to paper, photos, labels, die cuts, and other embellishments for your projects. Comes pre-loaded with 10 feet of non-toxic, acid-free, permanent adhesive. When you are ready to replace, simply drop in a new refill (sold separately).
